question.para: If I have a single big machine (database, file server, print server, etc) and another smaller server. Will my big machine develop a bad reputation?

answer.para: The reputation for the big machine will be larger than the small machine. In a normal deployment this should not be a concern, as the ⪚ should not be limited in its overall resources. If slowdown under heavy load is a concern, the big machine can have its reputation calculated differently as discussed in .
